verses.name: Ezekiel 48:22
verses.text: Moreover from the possession of the Levites, and from the possession of the city, being in the midst of that which is the prince’s, between the border of Judah and the border of Benjamin, shall be for the prince.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:23
verses.text: As for the rest of the tribes, from the east side unto the west side, Benjamin shall have a portion.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:24
verses.text: And by the border of Benjamin, from the east side unto the west side, Simeon shall have a portion.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:25
verses.text: And by the border of Simeon, from the east side unto the west side, Issachar a portion.
